summary: Implement and stabilize online payments in checkout, restricting payment method to a simplified Google Pay-only option for customers.
architectural_notes: Checkout payments should be limited to a single Google Pay (GPay) option tied to UPI number 9494237076, with a simplified customer flow.
known_issues: Online payment via UPI ID is currently not working.

existing_features.title: Update the payment configuration so the app offers only one online payment option: Google Pay to phone number 9494237076 (remove the UPI ID option entirely and make Google Pay the default).

Simplify the checkout payment UI to a Google Pay-only flow that is easy for customers: remove the 'Pay To' dropdown, prominently show the Google Pay number (9494237076), provide one-tap copy actions, and avoid any UPI-ID-specific validation/error messaging.

Ensure order records continue to store and display structured payment details for the Google Pay phone option (method, payee label/value, optional transaction reference) on the Order Confirmation and Order Details views.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix UPI payment and change checkout to offer only Google Pay (GPay) using UPI number 9494237076 with a simpler customer flow

projectName: Replace broken UPI-ID payments with Google Pay-only payment to 9494237076
